Low risk patients have a score 0-3 and have a less than 2% risk of MACE at 6 weeks.
0-3
:  0.9-1.7% risk of adverse cardiac event. Patient's can be discharged with follow-up.
4-6
: 12-16.6% risk of adverse cardiac event. Patients should be admitted to the hospital for trending of
troponin
and provocative testing.
≥7
: 50-65% risk of adverse cardiac event, suggesting early invasive measures with these patients and close coordination with inpatient cardiology
